properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deva ! nee swastyamu meeda samruddhigaa kuripinchumu Daahamuthonu dassina mammu balaparachi stiraparachumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aatmeeya goddu thanamulo nalamatinchu chunna maaku Upadesamichi parishudda parachi ujeevimpa jeeyu mammu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
